title: Qinglian Chronicles - Novel Updates
genre: Gender Bender   Historical   Martial Arts   Mature   Yaoi
tags: Ancient China   Aristocracy   Clever Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Female to Male   Handsome Male Lead   Politics   Romantic Subplot   Schemes And Conspiracies   Transmigration   Transported to Another World
author: 葡萄
description: MC (female protagonist) dies in a plane crash and wakes up in the body of a beautiful but corrupt and lascivious prime minister in ancient times, Zhang Qinglian. As circumstances decree, he (she) cannot reveal that the original owner’s soul is gone else calamity might occur. So he (she) decides to walk a righteous path, determined to help the lovely but simple little emperor rule the country. Not backing down after facing torture, not losing courage, destroying rebellions and facing off with scheming princes.>
